resources.string: 1. Which Napalm Death song is the shortest ever written?
1. And I recognize the cute one by his gait
2. Oh there is a birch tree in the field by the stream
2. Nazi-Punks Fuck Off написали Napalm Death?
2. This is a cover of Tanya Bulanova!
3. This is a cover of Dead Kennedys of course.
3. How long does the shortest song in their performance listed in the Guinness Book of Records last?
